install.name: AcyMailing Tag : insert VirtueMart products
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2010 ACYBA SARL - All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin enables you to insert VirtueMart product inside any e-mail sent by AcyMailing

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: vat
param.label: Add the VAT to the price
param.description: Select yes or no depending if you want to add the vat to the displayed price or not

param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Select if you want AcyMailing to display the short description or the full description of the product
